projectName.description: The human-readable title of the project this application is for. This will go at the top of the README.

packageName.description: The name of the package.json file generated by this application. This is typically the same as the project name.

dockerImage.description: The name of the Docker image generated by the application. Typically, this is the same as the repository name.

jenkinsEnvironment.description: The Jenkins environment to build this application in, if any.

serviceName.description: The service name used by this application. Typically, this is the same as the repository name.

hostName.description: The beginning portion of the URL this application is hosted on. Whatever you type here will, by default, be appended with '.apps-dev.wwtatc.com' during deployment.

componentName.description: The name of this application's component in the ATC Utility Belt. This does NOT create a component for you.

mongo.description: Whether or not you plan to connect your application to a Mongo database.

mongoCollections.description: A comma-delimited string containing the MongoDB collections you wish to utilize in your application.
